altTitles.en: The Best Medical God in the City

altTitles.ja: 一族を滅ぼされた俺が最強の力を手に入れて帰ってきた

description.en:
Five years ago, the Ye family was destroyed, and the trash Ye Chen disappeared mysteriously. Now, and the trash Ye Chen is back! He came back with a cultivating body that penetrated the heavens and the earth and cried, "Ghosts and gods!" 

This time, Ye Chen wants to make the sky fall in awe! Let the Earth tremble! To be in control of everything, to the top of the sky!

title.en: How I Attended an All-Guy's Mixer

altTitles.ja: 合コンに行ったら女がいなかった話

altTitles.ja-ro: Goukon ni Ittara Onna ga Inakatta Hanashi

altTitles.zh: 到了聯誼會上發現連一個女生都沒有

altTitles.pt-br: Como Eu Fui a um Encontro Só de Homens

description.en: Tokiwa, a university student, is invited to a three-on-three blind date by Suou, a fellow classmate. On the day of the mixer, he goes to the pub where they are supposed to meet, only to find a group of handsome men waiting for him...
description.pt-br: Tokiwa, um estudante universitário, é convidado para um encontro às cegas de três contra três por Suou, um colega de classe. No dia do encontro, ele vai ao pub onde deveriam se encontrar, apenas para encontrar um grupo de homens bonitos esperando por ele...

altTitles.vi: Đứa con gái tiểu quỷ đáng yêu của tôi

description.en: Sami-chan, who lives alone with her dad, has inherited her mom's silver hair and perfectly round eyes, making her an incredibly adorable daughter. However, this daughter has a secret. When she feels lonely, horns sprout from her head. She's a "half-demon" born from a devil...! Would having a daughter like this bring happiness!? Or... A heartwarming comedy filled with the bond between father and daughter?
description.ja:
まぁ手がかかる・・・でも、こんな娘がいたら幸せだ。

パパと2人暮らしのサミちゃんは、ママ譲りの銀髪、まん丸な瞳でとても可愛い愛娘。だが、この娘には秘密がある。寂しくなるとツノがニョキッと生える、悪魔との間に生まれた「半分“魔”な娘」だった･･･！こんな娘がいたら幸せ!?それとも･･･
父娘の絆が満ち満ちるハートフル？コメディー！

description.en: Due to the Gear Expansion, witches who had been friends with the people become unnecessary. Humans, who were afraid of unscientific power, begin a witch hunt… And a human boy who has his beloved witch killed becomes the “Wizard of vengeance”.
description.pt-br: Devido à Expansão da Tecnologia, as bruxas que eram amigas do povo se tornaram desnecessárias. Humanos, que temiam o poder não científico, começam uma caça às bruxas… E um menino humano que teve sua amada bruxa morta, se torna o “Mago da Vingança”.

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。
description.es-la:
"En este reino, criaturas mitológicas deambulan, descendientes de los nueve cielos que llaman hogar."
Sibuxiang, un hombre-ciervo mitológico y perezoso, es expulsado del cielo y asignado a apoyar a las criaturas mitológicas que vagan por el mundo humano. Conoce y vive aventuras con sus amigos: el enérgico Pixiu amante de la comida llamado Pipi, el fanático conejo lunar Tony, los hermanos ratones Jinjiao y Yinjiao, también desterrados del cielo, y muchos otros. ¿Qué tipo de aventuras emprenderán?

title.en: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago

altTitles.zh: 我家老婆来自一千年前

altTitles.zh-ro: Wojia Laopo Laizi Yiqian Nian Qian
Wǒjiā Lǎopó Láizì Yīqiān Nián Qián

altTitles.vi: Vợ Tôi Từ Một Ngàn Năm Trước
Bà Xã Nhà Tôi Đến Từ Ngàn Năm Trước

altTitles.fr: Ma femme vient d'il y a 1000 ans

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

altTitles.ru: Меня призвали в другой мир во второй раз!

altTitles.ja: 異世界召喚は二度目です

altTitles.en: This Is My Second Time Being Summoned to an Isekai.

altTitles.ru: Призванный в другой мир во второй раз

description.en:
There was once a man who was summoned to another world, and saved it. Of course, he became too popular there, and turned into an isekai-normie.   
However, that man fell into a "trap", and was forcibly returned to his original world. Moreover, he had to start over as a baby! This is the story of the way-too-fantastic ex-hero who lived as a gloomy high-schooler as he gets summoned once again to that other world in a very unexpected development!

title.en: I Will Break Ties With the Harmful Sister

description.en:
Clara, who had been oppressed for many years by her tyrant sister, Enefia. Even their parents obeyed the sister's wishes, and Clara had no place in the Astraia Baron’s household despite it being her home. In the midst of this, Clara's sister's engagement to a prominent nobleman was decided, and Clara finally felt relieved, believing she would be freed from this hell. However, even after the engagement, the sister's unfaithful nature did not change, and fearing the fiance might discover the inconvenient truth, the parents ordered Clara to monitor her sister. Despite Clara's efforts, her sister became pregnant with another man's child. The engagement was broken off, and the sister quickly eloped somewhere, leaving the Astraia Baron’s household with a huge debt, angering the influential nobleman. In order to repay her family's debts, Clara was sold to a sadistic noble and faced severe torture, ultimately approaching death.

"If I could do it over again... This time, I will definitely kill you!" When Clara opened her eyes again, time had rewound to the day of her sister’s engagement. Revived with strong determination, Clara pushed back against her sister's insidious bullying and ran to change the worst possible future.

The remote town of North Hill has been quarantined to prevent the spread of the mysterious Couper disease that is turning people into cannibals. Young soldier Billy returns to his hometown for the first time in six years for the woman he loves, but what horrors will be awaiting him...?
description.ja: その病は宇宙から飛来し、人から人へと侵攻する――。　隕石から発生した食人病〈クーパー病〉によりロックダウンを余儀なくされた、最果ての街ノースヒル。街を出て軍人となったビリーは6年ぶりに帰郷し、愛するエレノアに求婚する。一人子供を産み育てようとしていたエレノアはビリーとの再会を喜ぶが、出産の最中ノースヒルに再び隕石が!?

title.en: The Male Lead Is Trying to Change the Female Lead

altTitles.en: The Hero Is Trying to Change the Heroine

altTitles.fr: Le principal masculin essaie de changer la principale féminin
Le héros essaie de changer la heroïne

altTitles.es: ¿El protagonista masculino está tratando de cambiar a la protagonista femenina?

altTitles.ja: 脇役のはずが、主人公に求婚されています

description.en:
I ended up possessing the body of an extra named Luberia, who is barely mentioned in the story. And right in the tragic novel *Emperor Caesar*, full of wars and disasters, where the protagonist sacrifices everything for the love of the hero and everyone ends up dying! I planned to live discreetly and hide my strength... 

But the male lead, Caesar, keeps looking for me and even proposes marriage, saying he wants to keep me around. Luberia doesn't want to meet the same tragic end as the protagonist, so she tries to avoid Caesar at all costs... But due to Caesar's intimidating appearance and assertiveness, before she knows it, she ends up engaged to him. 

Will Luberia manage not to fall in love with Caesar and survive until the end?
description.es: Quedé poseída por la extra 'Ruberia' cuyo nombre apenas se mencionaba. ¡Por qué, en la empobrecida novela <César se convierte en Emperador>, que está llena de guerras y accidentes, y donde la protagonista femenina se sacrifica por el protagonista masculino y todos mueren! Había planeado ocultar mis fuerzas y vivir en silencio y en silencio... El protagonista masculino, "César", sigue visitando a Ruberia e incluso le pide que se case con él, diciendo que quiere mantenerla a su lado.

altTitles.ja: ヤンキーJKクズハナちゃん

altTitles.pt-br: Garota Delinquente Do Ensino Médio Kuzuhana-chan

description.en: At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone. Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?
description.fr: Au début de l'année scolaire, Saotome Hodaka intègre le lycée préfectoral de Moteshiro, ancien établissement réservé aux filles et récemment devenu mixte. Il découvre rapidement que le ratio garçons/filles est de 1:359! Bien que cela puisse sembler être un paradis pour certains, la majorité des élèves sont des délinquantes, et Saotome se retrouve aussitôt extorqué par certaines des filles les plus agressives. Par chance, il est sauvé malgré lui par Hanako Kuzuryu, une belle délinquante qui aspire seulement à être laissée en paix. Est-ce le début d'une nouvelle amitié ? Comment la vie de Saotome évoluera-t-elle dans une école pleine de filles turbulentes ?
description.ja: 男女比率1対359!! 359人の女子高生にいじられまくり!! つらたんハーレム学園ラブコメ!! コワかわ最強ヒロイン爆誕!! 四方八方ギャルだらけな県立茂手城高校に入学した黒一点・早乙女穂高は、ヤンキーJK・九頭竜華子にピンチを救われて…!?
description.pt-br: Uma proporção de homem para mulher de 1:359?! Saotome-kun é admitido em uma escola cheia de gyarus e conhece uma garota delinqüente chamada Hanako Kuzuryu.

title.en: Since I don't know about it, should we part ways, Your Majesty?

description.en:
Due to a carriage accident, Lumiere suffers from amnesia. 
While searching for her memories, she discovers a warning in her diary.

[Do not fall for him.]

At that time, a man claiming to be her lover appears.
“I know everything about you, even the parts you don't know yourself.”

This man, who doesn't exist in her memories.
But she finds herself increasingly attracted to him…

… Were we really lovers? Why did we break up?
Is approaching the truth really the right thing for me?
description.ko:
마차 사고로 인해 기억상실증에 걸린 르미에.
기억을 찾기 위해 본 일기장에서 경고를 발견한다.

[그를 사랑해선 안 돼.]

그때, 그녀의 연인이었다고 주장하는 남자가 찾아왔다.
"난 당신 스스로도 모르는 부분까지 전부 다, 알고 있으니까."

분명 기억 속엔 존재하지 않는 그.
하지만 그에게 점점 끌리는 자신을 발견하는데...

…진짜 우린 연인이었을까? 왜 헤어진 걸까?
진실에 다가서는 것이, 정말로 나를 위한 일이 맞을까?

altTitles.th: พ่อครัวจอมมายา

description.en:
Ajiyoshi Yoichi is a culinary prodigy who manages the eating house together with his mother. One day, Murata Genjiro appears in the eating house and is surprised at the delicious taste and delicate culinary skills of the katsu-don prepared by Youichi. Subsequently, Youichi is being invited to the Aji-oh Building in which he is involved in a spaghetti match with the in-house Italian chef, Marui. Youichi's novel culinary ideas, coupled with his enthusiasm of serving the best for his guests, allow him to defeat Marui in the match. From then on, Youichi begins to compete with other rivals in the race for the best tastes and dishes.

---
- **Won the 12th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 1988**

title.en: I Became the Only Healer in This World

altTitles.ru: Я стала единственным хилером в этом мире

altTitles.ja: この世界で唯一のヒーラーになりました

description.en:
A lifelong game-addict healer with decades of experience.
By chance, the world changed, and I became the only healer in existence.
[A place that needs you, the one and only healer, has summoned you.]

[Will you accept the summons?]
"What? They have tanks and DPS but no healer?"
Seriously, what kind of broken game balance is this?

[The constellations observing you protest indignantly: "This isn’t a game—it’s reality!"] Decades have passed since the Gates first appeared.
I’d heard they’d accumulated plenty of strategies and data by now, but— "Why is everyone so inefficient? It’s infuriating."

As someone obsessed with optimal strategies, I focused solely on obliterating the Gates. But then— "You’re the one who saved me. You made it so I can’t see anyone but you."
—A betrayed former No. 1 ranker who became a recluse: "I need you. My savior. My life."
—The leader of the world’s top 10 guild alliance: "Don’t abandon me. I can’t even breathe without you."
—The current No. 1 ranker: "I’m already drowning in Gate raids, but now these strange people won’t leave me alone."

(Source: KakaoPage, edited)
description.ru:
Девушка, играющая за хилера на протяжении многих лет, так и не смогла ничего достичь. Однажды, невероятным образом она переместилась в другой мир, в котором не оказалось ни одного хилера.  
— Есть пати, которое хочет пригласить вас, невероятного и неповторимого хилера. Вы ответите на призыв?  
"А? У них есть танки и ДД, но ни одного хилера? У них тут вообще хоть что-то сбалансированно?"  — 
Это не игра, а реальность. И созвездия, защищающие тебя, будут жаловаться тебе на жизнь!    

***  
Врата появились несколько десятилетий назад. За это время накопилось множество тактик и сведений, но...  
— Что за унылые атаки в лоб? Ещё не надоело?  
Из-за очень наивной тактики врата брали напролом.  
— Это вы ведь меня спасли? Лишь благодаря вашим способностями.  
Преданный, скрывающийся бывший первый ранг...  
— О, моя спасительница, не покидай меня.  
...директор ассоциации 10 гильдий...  
— Прошу, не бросай меня. Я не смогу жить без тебя.  
...и даже нынешний первый ранг — каждый был восхищен ею.  
Когда она была занята тактикой прохождения врат, начали появляться странные дети, что совершенно не входило в её планы.

description.en:
A spinoff of the magazine *Aokishi*, *Aokishi Bunny* is a yearly extra booklet featuring stories of bunny girls in all walks of life!

**Vol. 1 (Released With *Aokishi Vols. 3A* & *3B*)**
-
**Cover:** Mori Kaoru

**Chapters:**
1​.  Mori Kaoru - 撞球室 / Doukyuushitsu / Billiards Room
2. Ootsuki Ichika - ミルフィオリ・バニー / Millefiori Bunny / Millefiori Bunny - **Serialized as [*Piccolina*](https://mangadex.org/title/ced1a3f9-9a34-4ada-a3b7-ca773e5af0b8/piccolina). This became [Chapter 1](https://mangadex.org/chapter/f8b271bc-0511-4c53-ac6f-990d99a32722).**
3. Kezuka Ryouichirou - GIVE ME A CUE! / GIVE ME A CUE! / GIVE ME A CUE!
4. Hasegawa Mirai - 夢見るバニーじゃいられない / Yumemiru Bunny ja Irarenai / Can't Be A Dreaming Bunny
5. Kokamumo - クロシオカレント激闘！！ バニーガール三姉妹 / Kuroshio Current Gekitou!! Bunny Girl San-shimai / Black Tide Current Fierce Battle!! Three Bunny Girl Sisters
6. Shibata Kouhei - バニーヒート / Bunny Heat / Bunny Heat
7. Takahashi Hirona - 熟考する男/見える男の神社探訪 /  Jukkou Suru Otoko/Mieru Otoko no Jinja Tanbou / Contemplating Man/Seeing Man Shrine Exploration
8. Nakamura Tetsuya - バニー対ディアンドル / Bunny Tai Dirndl / Bunny vs Dirndl

**Illustration:** Hamburger

**Vol. 2 (Released With *Aokishi Vols. 8A* & *8B*)**
-
**Cover:** Hamburger

**Chapters:**
9​. Mori Kaoru - とまり木 / Tomarigi / Barstool
10. Be-con {初め処女のごとく、後は脱兎の如し} / Be-con {Hajime Shoko no Gotoku, Go wa Datto no Gotoshi}
11. 佐々木つかさ {ショット・バニー・ショット} / Sasaki Tsukasa {Shot Bunny Shot}
12. ムネヘロ {刺激が強すぎる？} / Munehero {Shigeki ga Tsuyosugiru?}
13. 七尾朋 (つきづきよし) {満月の夜、君に会いたい} / Nanao Tomo (Tsukizuki Yoshi) {Mangetsu no Yoru, Kimi ni Aitai}
14. 有海とよこ {君の才能は「Coelho Foffo」} / Ariumi Toyoko {Your Talent is “Coelho Foffo”}
15. 岸田彩 {バニー飯} / Kishida Aya {Bunny Meals}
16. Shibata Kouhei - サンセット・バニー / Sunset Bunny / Sunset Bunny
17. Miyama Run - ユーベルのエル / Yuuberu no Eru / ???
18. Yasuhara Moe - テキーラバニーとスニーカー / Tequila Bunny to Sneakers / Tequila Bunny and Sneakers
19. Ootsuki Ichika - ピッコリーナ〜ご贔屓方のお楽しみ〜 / Piccolina ~Gohiiki-kata no Otanoshimi~ / Piccolina ~For The Enjoyment Of Our Dear Patrons~}
20. Sarukago Aki - PRIVATE BUNNY / PRIVATE BUNNY / PRIVATE BUNNY

**Illustrations:**
こかむも / Kokamumo
春夏秋冬鈴 / Hitotose Rin
熊倉隆敏 / Kumakura Takatoshi
Kezuka Ryouichirou
小坂玲音/ Koita Leo
星野翼 / Hoshino Tsubasa

**Vol. 3 (Released With *Aokishi Vols. 14A* & *14B*)**
-
**Cover:** Ootsuki Ichika

**Chapters:**
21​. 鈴木りつ {バニーバニースーツスーツ} / Suzuki Ritsu {Bunny Bunny Suit Suit}
22. 加藤勇気 {バニーガール} / Katou Yuuki {Bunny Girl}
23. 高橋拡那 {モネちゃんのしっぽ} / Takahashi Hirona {Mone-chan no Shippo}
24. ムネヘロ {アリかナシか} / Munehero {Ari ka Nashi ka}
25. Ootsuki Ichika - ピッコリーナ：カラフルバニー / Piccolina: Colorful Bunny - **Included as [Chapter 11](https://mangadex.org/chapter/6732e93a-8dee-49fc-9384-fc747bc20a0b) of *Piccolina Vol. 2*.**
26. クサダ {バニーガール攻撃部隊} / Kusada {Bunny Girl Attack Force}
27. Mori Kaoru - 介抱 / Kaihou / Care

**Illustrations:**
Be-con
Hamburger
Miyama Run
高橋祥志 / Takahashi Hiroshi
こかむも / Kokamumo

A mysterious circus. A missing friend. A dangerous deal. Julia Lazarrett is happy with her honest, predictable life. But when her best friend Kamille convinces her to visit a travelling circus, they both get more than for which they bargained. Thrust into a world full of secrets, magic, and death, Julia finds herself presented with the most horrific of deals in order to survive.

altTitles.th: เบอร์เซิร์ก

description.en:
Guts, known as the Black Swordsman, seeks sanctuary from the demonic forces attracted to him and his woman because of a demonic mark on their necks, and also vengeance against the man who branded him as an unholy sacrifice.

Aided only by his titanic strength gained from a harsh childhood lived with mercenaries, a gigantic sword, and an iron prosthetic left hand, Guts must struggle against his bleak destiny, all the while fighting with a rage that might strip him of his humanity.  
  
***Won the 6th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize Excellence Award in 2002.***

---

Note: Following Miura Kenta's death in 2021, the series has been taken over by Kouji Mori, who supervises the series with art done by Studio Gaga.
description.es: Guts, conocido como el Espadachín Negro, busca refugio de las fuerzas demoníacas que se sienten atraídas por él y su mujer debido a una marca demoníaca en el cuello, además de vengarse del hombre que lo marcó como un sacrificio impío. Únicamente con la ayuda de su fuerza titánica, adquirida tras una dura infancia vivida con mercenarios, una espada gigantesca y una prótesis de hierro en la mano izquierda, Guts deberá luchar contra su sombrío destino, al tiempo que combate con una rabia que podría despojarle de su humanidad.
description.ru: Гатс – Черный Мечник, за которым охотятся демоны. Мечник стремится найти все убежища демонов и отомстить человеку, сделавшего их него «жертвенную овечку». Черный Мечник противостоит жестокой судьбе благодаря непоколебимой воле, невероятной силе, и, конечно же, меча. Постоянные сражения со злом приближает Гатса к параллельному миру тьмы, лишая его человечности. Берсерк – сложная, но сильная история о сражениях и злой судьбе.
description.th:
เบอร์เซิร์ก เป็นชื่อมังงะ แนวดาร์ค แฟนตาซี ของญี่ปุ่น วาดโดยเคนทาโร่ มิอุระ มีการดำเนินเรื่องเกิดขึ้นในยุคกลางของยุโรป โดยได้รับอิทธิพลมาจากโลกแห่งจินตนิมิตด้านมืด มีตัวละครเอกของเรื่องคือ กัทส์ ทหารรับจ้างผู้โดดเดี่ยวและ กริฟฟิท หัวหน้าของกลุ่มทหารรับจ้างที่รวมตัวกันภายใต้ชื่อ กองพันเหยี่ยว

----
 [Shopee (ไทย)](https://shopee.co.th/berserk%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%8C%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%8B%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%81-%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%B4%E0%B9%8A%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%84-%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A1-1-20-%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A1%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B7%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B6%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%87-i.63434898.1855330863)
description.tr:
Kara Kılıç Ustası olarak anılan Guts, vücutlarındaki şeytani damga yüzünden onlara musallat olan şeytani güçlerden, kadınını ve kendisini korumanın bir yolunu aramaktadır. Aynı zamanda onu damgalayan ve bir kurban konumuna düşüren adamdan intikam almaya çalışmaktadır. Paralı askerlerle geçirdiği zorlu çocukluk yıllarının getirdiği tecrübeler sayesinde elde ettiği büyük gücü, devasa bir kılıç ve protez bir kol ile destekleyen Guts, karamsar kaderiyle mücadele etmek zorundadır. Tüm bunları yaparken, insani benliğini kaybetmesine neden olabilecek öfkeyle başa çıkmalıdır. 

TheWildDeer'dan Dorylaion tarafından biraz yorum katılarak sitedeki ingilizce açıklamadan çevrilmiştir.
description.uk: Його ім'я Ґатс, Чорний Мечник. Він могутній воїн, про якого говорять лишень пошепки. У нього є велетенський меч , рука зі заліза й шрами від незліченних боїв і тортур. А ще його плоть позначена Тавром — нечестивим символом, який притягує сили пітьми й робить Ґатса їхньою жертвою. Але Ґатс не прийме таку долю спокійно: він порубає на фарш війська проклятих, як і будь-кого, кому стане дурості стати на його шляху! Ґатс іде в товаристві ельфа Пака (більше докучайла, ніж товариша) темним і закривавленим шляхом, який приведе лише до загибелі... Чи помсти.
description.es-la: Guts, conocido como el Espadachín Negro, busca refugio de las fuerzas demoníacas que se sienten atraídas por él y su mujer debido a una marca demoníaca en el cuello, además de vengarse del hombre que lo marcó como un sacrificio impío. Únicamente con la ayuda de su fuerza titánica, adquirida tras una dura infancia vivida con mercenarios, una espada gigantesca y una prótesis de hierro en la mano izquierda, Guts deberá luchar contra su sombrío destino, al tiempo que combate con una rabia que podría despojarle de su humanidad.
description.pt-br: Guts, conhecido como o Espadachim Negro, busca refúgio das forças demoníacas atraídas por ele e sua mulher por causa de uma marca demoníaca em seus pescoços, e também vingança contra o homem que o marcou como um sacrifício profano.  Ajudado apenas por sua força titânica adquirida de uma infância dura vivida com mercenários, uma espada gigantesca e uma mão esquerda protética de ferro, Guts deve lutar contra seu destino sombrio, enquanto luta com uma raiva que pode despojá-lo de sua humanidade.

altTitles.en: The Even Bigger Island of Giant Insects
The Island of Giant Insects, Die

description.en: New enemies, new bugs and an even bigger island.
description.ja: 辰野神島へと脱出した睦美たちは天空を制圧するトンボに追いつめられる!
description.vi: Mutsumi và những người bạn của cô đã thành công đến được đảo Tatsuno Oshima, nơi mà người dân vẫn đang vui vẻ tổ chức lễ hội... Và rồi đúng như những gì Mutsumi đã đoán trước những con côn trùng khổng lồ đã bắt đầu âm thầm tấn công người dân. Để tránh thảm kịch như các hòn đảo trước thì Mutsumi và các bạn của cô sẽ làm gì đây?

description.en:
MangaZombie:  
  
"When I talk about ‘warped manga from a warped mind’, I always think of this incoherent story.   
  
The Human Clock is a lot simpler to summarize than to understand. The hero is Yubi Chizuo again; he’s a student like before, but this time round he’s also a dropout. He stays in his house, which is a family shop selling watches and clocks. He gazes and gazes at them, and little by little, turns into one himself. That is the entire story. It reminds me of Franz Kafka’s Metamorphosis."  
  
Also contains the story, The Cat's Mourning Suit (Chapter 6).
description.vi: Một câu chuyện kinh dị siêu thực của cố tác giả Tokunan Seiichirou. Tác phẩm được phát hành lần đầu năm 1962 và không nhận đạt được thành công về mặt thương mại. Bản thân tác giả lúc sinh thời cũng đã bỏ nghề sau này. Nhưng theo thời gian tác phẩm dần trở thành một trong những ấn bản được người hâm mộ dòng truyện tranh thử nghiệm (alternative) săn lùng nhiều nhất. Đến năm 1996, truyện được tái bản và in cùng "Tang phục của con mèo."

altTitles.ja: 海が走るエンドロール

description.en:
After turning 65 and bereaved of her husband, Umiko visits a cinema for the first time in decades. A shocking, life-changing event awaits her. When she meets Kai, an art student majoring in film, Umiko realises that she wants to make a film. She realises that she is on the side of "the people who want to make films"...
Lured by the waves that stir her heart, the 65-year-old dives into the sea of film!
description.ja:
65歳を過ぎ夫と死別し、数十年ぶりに映画館を訪れたうみ子。そこには、人生を変える衝撃的な出来事が待っていた。海(カイ)という映像専攻の美大生に出会い、うみ子は気づく。自分は「映画が撮りたい側」の人間なのだと……。
心を騒ぎ立てる波に誘われ、65歳、映画の海へとダイブする!!

title.en: After His Insomnia Was Cured, the Tyrant Became Obsessive

altTitles.ko: 不眠症を治しただけなのに暴君に執着されてます

description.en: A young woman who works as a book-reading YouTuber falls asleep while reading and is possessed by the book she is reading. She ends up in the tyrant's bedroom. Once inside the tyrant's bedroom, she tells him what she needs to do to stay alive, and he falls asleep while listening. From then on, she becomes the tyrant's insomnia therapist. In order to escape from the tyrant, she must cure his insomnia, but as she does, the tyrant becomes obsessed with her...

title.en: Gal Can't Be Kind to Otaku!?

altTitles.ja: オタクに優しいギャルはいない!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Otaku ni Yasashii Gyaru wa Inai!?
Otaku ni Yasashii Gyaru ha Inai!?

altTitles.zh: 没有辣妹会对阿宅温柔!?

altTitles.pt-br: Gal Não Pode ser Gentil com Otaku!?

altTitles.es-la: ¿¡Las Gals no pueden ser amables con los Otakus!?

altTitles.vi: Gyaru không thể tử tế với Otaku ư?

description.en: Takuya Seo is an otaku who likes "anime for girls" and can't say he likes it out loud. One day, he hooks up with two gals from his class, Amane and Ijichi, but it seems that Amane is also an otaku...
description.ja: あまり大きな声で好きと言えない“女児向けアニメ”が好きなオタク 瀬尾卓也。ある日、クラスのギャル 天音さんと伊地知さんに絡まれたのだが、何やら天音さんもオタクの匂いが…？
description.vi: Một anh bạn trung bình Otaku thích anime dành cho bé gái, giáp mặt hai nàng Gyaru xinh đẹp nổi tiếng nhất trường. Nhưng không chỉ có thế, một trong hai nữ nhân xinh đẹp ấy có gì đó...hơi otaku thì phải...?
description.es-la: Takuya Seo es un otaku al que le gusta el "anime para chicas" y no puede decir que le guste en voz alta. Un día, se junta con dos chicas de su clase, Amane e Ijichi, pero parece que Amane también es una otaku...
description.pt-br: Takuya Seo é um otaku que gosta de "animes para garotinhas" e não pode dizer isso em voz alta. Um dia, ele conversa com duas gals da sua sala, Amane e Ijichi, mas parece que a Amane também é uma otaku... Uma comédia romântica escolar onde o otaku conhece as gals que ele gosta!

altTitles.ja: 魔法科高校の劣等生　エスケープ編

altTitles.en: The Irregular at Magic High School - Escape Arc

description.en: Adaption of Light Novel 24-25.
description.ja: 七賢人を名乗るレイモンド・クラークにより、「トーラス・シルバー」の正体が司波達也であると暴露されてしまった。USNAが提唱するディオーネー計画への参加を巡って世界中が達也の動向に注目し、深雪たちが通う魔法科高校も好奇の目に晒される事態に。だが達也はかねてより進めていたプロジェクトを利用して、世界を裏から操ろうとする者たちに反旗を翻す――!!
description.es-la: Raymond Clark, autodenominado como uno de los "Siete Sabios", revela que Shiba Tatsuya es la verdadera identidad detrás de "Taurus Silver". El mundo está atento a los movimientos de Tatsuya debido a su participación en el proyecto Dione propuesto por la USNA, y la escuela de magia a la que asisten Miyuki y los demás también se ve envuelta en la atención pública. Sin embargo, utilizando un proyecto que había estado desarrollando, Tatsuya se rebela contra aquellos que intentan manipular el mundo desde las sombras. Adaptación de la Novela Ligera 24-25.

description.en:
Blue Archive GLB's official 4-Koma, featuring snippets of the daily occurrences in Kivotos!

For the Official English and Korean versions, you can find them on the respective server's Twitter account.

The series is titled (Global) to differentiate it from the Japanese 4-Koma.

---
**Links:**
- [Blue Archive EN's Twitter](https://twitter.com/EN_BlueArchive)
- [Blue Archive KR's Twitter](https://twitter.com/KR_BlueArchive)
- [JP Server's 4-Koma](https://mangadex.org/title/1f63ea84-6bc6-4312-81bf-b28d5592d802/blue-archive-japan)

altTitles.ja: タダでは抱かれません

altTitles.en: I Won't Sleep with You for Free

altTitles.id: Aku Gak Nidurin Kamu Secara Cuma-cuma

altTitles.th: ชีวิตพลิกผัน ฉันขายตัวให้เพื่อน

description.en: Miyako Kirishima, a university student and aspiring teacher, is a poor girl who enjoys being frugal. One day, she has a meal with Yui Nakano, her friend whom she occasionally tutors. On the way home, Yui invites her to a love hotel. Miyako is reluctant, unwilling to have sex with a friend. However, Yui cuts her off, offering her 30000 yen for sex! Subsequently, Miyako ends up in more "transactions" with her other friends at her women's university!? The curtain rises on a tale of yuri, friendship, money, and sex♡.
description.id: Kirishima Miyako, mahasiswa di sebuah universitas khusus wanita dan calon guru, adalah seorang gadis miskin yang menjalani hidup serba hemat. Suatu hari, setelah ditraktir oleh teman gadisnya Nakano Yui, dia diajak untuk mengunjungi ke love hotel. Namun, dia menolaknya karena enggan untuk berhubungan seks dengan temannya. Sampai kemudian, Yui menawarkannya 30.000 yen jika Miyako menerima ajakannya. Sejak saat itu, Miyako melakukan lebih banyak "transaksi" dengan teman-temannya yang lain dari universitasnya!? Kisahpun Yuri tentang persahabatan, uang dan seks pun dimulai.
description.th: คิริชิมะ มิยาโกะ สาวมหาลัยยาจกที่ใฝ่ฝันอยากเป็นครู ได้จับพลัดจับผลูไปเข้าโรงแรมม่านรูดกับเพื่อนซี้นามว่า นากาโนะ ยุย โดยเธอขอมีเซ็กส์ด้วยโดยแลกกับเงิน 30000 เยน! แบบนี้มีหรือมิยาโกะจะไม่เอา!

description.en:
A world where there are ‘superpowers’, a new race of humans who surpass human abilities, and ‘guides’ who can control their rampage.

'Betty', a guide, hides her identity and lives in a small town in America. One day, 'James', a super-powered hero, transfers to Betty's school to find the villain 'Dave'. Betty avoids James but continues to become involved with him and to make matters worse, while trying to stop her best friend's rampage of superpowers, she is forced to use her guide abilities... It turns out that her friend is not an ordinary superpower, but a villain.

It was 'Dave'!

Betty is caught between a villain and a hero, and her life, which she wanted to live normally, begins to spiral.

title.en: Subete no Jinrui o Hakai Suru. Sorera wa Saisei Dekinai.

altTitles.ja: すべての人類を破壊する。それらは再生できない。

altTitles.ja-ro: Subete no Jinrui wo Hakai Suru. Sorera ha Saisei Dekinai.

altTitles.ja: Destroy all humankind. They can't be regenerated.

altTitles.en: Destroy All Humans. They Can’t Be Regenerated. A Magic: The Gathering Manga
Destroy All Humankind. They Can't Be Regenerated.
Destroy All of Humanity. It Can't Be Regenerated.

altTitles.es-la: Destruye a toda la humanidad. Ellos no pueden regenerarse.

altTitles.ru: Уничтожите всё человечество. Оно не может быть регенерировано.

altTitles.pt-br: Destrua Toda a Humanidade. Eles Não Podem Ser Regenerados.

description.en: This “youth graffiti” manga centers on two people in the 1990s who play the Magic the Gathering trading card game.
description.es-la: El manga de "youth graffiti" se centra en dos personas de los años 90 que juegan al juego de cartas coleccionables Magic the Gathering.
description.pt-br:
Julho de 1999, o mês em que o mundo será destruído segundo Nostradamus. O estudante do fundamental, chamado Hajime, sempre fica atrás de sua rival, a bela Sawatari. Ela não o considera como seu rival, após de ter se introduzido como tal. Ele também é um avido jogador de "Magic: The Gathering". Enquanto ele procura novas cartas ele descobre que a Sawatari também joga MTG, mas escondida. Ela foge após reconhecer ele durante uma partida do card game. No dia seguinte ele desafia ela para um duelo, com um deck especial criado para ganhar dela, prometendo ficar falado e fazer qualquer coisa que ela desejar caso perca. Uma coisa leva a outra e eles finalmente se tornam amigos. Que no fim ele lembra que este era seu objetivo inicial. 

| O título do manga é um trocadilho com a descrição da carta "Cólera de Deus" que é "Destrua todas as criaturas. Elas não podem ser regeneradas." |

description.en: A regular person falls in love with a superhero who protects Earth! In terms of circumstances, ability, experience--they are from two different worlds, but they get to know each other, support each other, and then... A unique love story on a planetary scale now begins!
description.fr:
Sauvé in extremis de la mort, Sawada Reisuke ne se souvient que d'une chose : l'apparence de la femme qui l'a sauvé. Alors quand il la reconnait dans la rue, Hoshifuri Kaeri est absolument abasourdie de découvrir quelqu'un capable de résister au système de suppression de mémoire qui lui sert tant. Ainsi, à force de se retrouver malgré les souvenirs effacés à répétition, Kaeri invite peu à peu Reisuke dans son monde, dans sa vie passée à protéger la Terre avec ses pouvoirs.

Mais face aux pires désastres qu'ait connu la Terre, lorsque l'humanité toute entière frise l'extinction, que peut faire un homme tout à fait normal pour protéger l'avenir de sa super-famille ?
description.it: Gli Earthchild sono bambini che nascono con doti speciali e il cui destino è quello di lottare per la salvezza del nostro pianeta all'oscuro di tutti. Ma cosa succede quando un Earthchild si innamora di un uomo comune? Quali conseguenze potrebbe mai portare nella sua vita e in quella di chi ama?

altTitles.en: The Irregular at Magic High School - Isolation Arc

altTitles.ja: 魔法科高校の劣等生 孤立編

description.en:
Late April 2097—the use of strategic-class spells doesn’t stop with the Brazilian military, as the Great Asian Alliance deploy Thunderclap Tower in the Gulf of Guinea. Magic fans the flames of war, which soon engulf the entire world. As public opinion inevitably turns against magicians as a whole, Edward Clark, a researcher of the USNA, proposes an expansive space development endeavor called the Dione Project to promote the peaceful use of magic. Taurus Silver’s name appears on the list of chosen candidates, which leads to people uncovering the truth—that this is in fact Tatsuya, throwing him and Miyuki into yet another trial.

Adaption of Light Novel 23.
description.es-la: En el año 2097, la guerra se expande debido a la magia de clase estratégica. Con la creciente condena hacia los magos en todo el mundo, la USNA anuncian el "Proyecto Dione", que busca el uso pacífico de la magia. Shiba Tatsuya es convocado como miembro de ese plan, actuando bajo el nombre conjunto "Taurus Silver" mientras oculta su identidad como ingeniero mágico. ¿Cuál será la decisión de Tatsuya? Adaptación de la Novela Ligera 23.

title.en: Class no Daikirai na Joshi to Kekkon Suru Koto ni Natta

altTitles.ja: クラスの大嫌いな女子と結婚することになった。

altTitles.en: I Got Married to the Girl I Hate Most in Class

altTitles.zh-hk: 我要和班裡我最討厭的妹子結婚了。

altTitles.vi: Kết Hôn Với Đứa Con Gái Mà Tôi Ghét Nhất Trong Lớp

description.en:
High school student Hojo Saito married his classmate, Sakuramori Akane, the girl who's his worst enemy in school.

"If you tell the rest of the class we’re married, I'll kill you."
"I don't want them to know either. There’s no point in that."

Their newlywed life wasn't going so well, and they were constantly at odds. However, as they progress through their daily lives, the distance between them closes, they have more enjoyable moments together, and they gradually come to understand one another. Saito learns about Akane's cute side, which he never saw before, and Akane gradually began to recognize the feelings that she’s been keeping inside...
description.ja: 「私と結婚してること、クラスのみんなに言ったら殺すから」これは嫌い合っている二人がお互いを知り、本当の夫婦になるまでの物語。
description.vi:
Học sinh trung học Hojo Saito đã kết hôn với bạn cùng lớp của mình, Sakuramori Akane, cô gái mà cậu xem là kẻ thù lớn nhất trong trường.
“Nếu cậu nói với cả lớp rằng chúng ta đã kết hôn, tớ sẽ giết cậu.”
“Tớ cũng không muốn họ biết đâu. Chẳng có ích gì cả.”
Cuộc sống hôn nhân của họ không diễn ra suôn sẻ và họ thường xuyên xung đột. Tuy nhiên, khi họ cùng trải qua những ngày tháng thường nhật, khoảng cách giữa hai người dần thu hẹp lại, họ có nhiều khoảnh khắc vui vẻ bên nhau hơn, và dần dần bắt đầu hiểu nhau hơn. Saito bắt đầu khám phá ra những khía cạnh dễ thương của Akane mà trước đây cậu chưa từng thấy, còn Akane cũng từ từ nhận ra những cảm xúc mà cô ấy đã giữ kín bấy lâu...
description.pt-br:
O estudante do ensino médio Hojo Saito se casou com sua colega de classe, Sakuramori Akane, a garota que é seu pior inimigo na escola. 

“Se você contar ao resto da turma que somos casados, eu mato você” 

“Eu também não quero que eles saibam. Não há sentido nisso. ” 

A vida de recém-casados não estava indo muito bem e eles estavam constantemente em conflito. No entanto, à medida que avançam em suas vidas diárias, a distância entre eles diminui, eles passam momentos mais agradáveis juntos e, aos poucos, passam a se entender. Saito aprende sobre o lado fofo de Akane, que ele nunca tinha visto antes, e Akane gradualmente começou a reconhecer os sentimentos que ela estava guardando… 

A vida de recém-casado comovente de duas pessoas que simplesmente não conseguem ser honestas uma com a outra começa aqui!

title.en: Chou Ten-chan! NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE Koushiki Anthology

altTitles.ja: 超てんちゃん！ NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE公式アンソロジー

altTitles.en: Super An-chan! NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE Official Anthology
Super Ten-chan! NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE Official Anthology
KAngel! NEEDY STREAMER OVERLOAD Official Anthology
OMGkawaiiAngel! NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE Official Anthology

description.en:
The Internet Angel’s advent upon this manga world!!!

The super popular game *NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE*'s first official anthology!

altTitles.vi: Bắt nạt mình đi mà, nữ phản diện ơi!

altTitles.th: โปรดรังแกฉันทีคุณนางร้าย!

altTitles.zh-ro: Qǐng qīfù wǒ ba, è yì xiǎojiě!

altTitles.ru: Пожалуйста, поиздевайтесь надо мной, мисс Злодейка!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor, me humilhe, senhorita vilã!

altTitles.ar: !تنمرِ علي من فضلكِ يا أنسة الشر

altTitles.fr: Je vous en supplie madame l'antagoniste, Harcelez moi !

altTitles.ja: いじめてください、悪役令嬢様！

altTitles.tr: Lütfen Bana Zorbalık Yap, Kötü Hanım!

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.tr: Ben, Yvonne, bir Otome oyununda zengin kötü karakter olarak reenkarne oldum. Oyunun hikayesine göre benim gibi herkesin nefret ettiği bir karakter, ana karaktere zorbalık yapmak, onu hoşlanabileceği çeşitli karakterlerin romantik rotalarına sürüklemek gibi bir ana göreve sahip. Ama görünen o ki Elsa’da bir gariplik var, kahraman! Benimle fazla yakınlaşıyor!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

description.en:
High school girl Luna Amano waits for her missing sister and runs a flower shop alone. However, the flower shop is suddenly burned down by the landlord Gokudo. When tragedy is imminent, memories that do not exist in her mind come back. A cold-blooded fresh-blooded JK gun action with transcendent drawing power released by an up-and-coming artist!

Version français : 

Après la disparition soudaine de sa grande sœur, Luna Amano, une jeune lycéenne, tient seule la boutique de fleurs de cette dernière, espérant toujours son retour. Jusqu'au jour où des yakuzas incendient la boutique pour s’emparer du terrain. Au cœur de cette tragédie, des souvenirs et des compétences de survie qui ne devraient pas exister ressurgissent en elle. Désormais, elle devra tuer pour retrouver sa sœur.

altTitles.th: กู่เสียงฝันให้ก้องฟ้า

description.en: Aozora Yell centers on Tsubasa, a girl who saw an inspirational brass band performance at the finals of the Japanese high school baseball championships one summer. Tsubasa vows to join the band when she enters high school, and she happens to meet a certain boy there.
description.pt-br: A história gira em torno de Tsubasa, que viu uma apresentação de uma banda de metais nas finais do campeonato Japonês de beisebol em um verão. Tsubasa promete se juntar a banda quando entrar no colegial, e acontece dela conhecer um garoto que tem objetivos parecidos com os dela e os dois se esforçam para realizar seus sonhos.

description.en: "Botsu" as in "rejected/unused concept"

altTitles.ja: 異剣戦記ヴェルンディオ

altTitles.es-la: Völundio: Saga de las espadas divergentes

altTitles.vi: Volundio - Sử thi về mộng kiếm

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

title.en: The Dentist Won't Stop Teasing Me

description.en: After suffering from an unbearable pain caused by a wisdom tooth, Cai Tong'an visits the dentist, only to be greeted with a beautiful and gentle Dr. Xie Ruanqing. To her surprise, she turns out to be the senior she secretly admired during her university days...

A hot-tempered Taoist priest finds himself entangled with an arrogant vampire, drawn into a whirlwind of love and hatred fueled by karmic ties from their past lives.

In the present day, he’s barely scraping by, working odd jobs on a film set. But one day, he senses a powerful, ominous energy. When he looks up, he’s shocked to find that the source is none other than the nation’s biggest movie star, Shen Que?! The charming and sophisticated actor the world admires—is actually a thousand-year-old vampire?

“You’re not getting away from me this time!”

Ryoma Echizen just joined the Seishun Academy's tennis team, which is known for being one of the most competitive teams in Japan. Its members are incredibly talented, gifted, and athletic. With rigorous and extremely intense practices, the upperclassmen of the team expect the very best from themselves and they expect even more from the new members of the team. While most of the freshmen are on pins and needles hoping they won't get cut from the team, Ryoma Echizen is confident, cool, and collected. Some might even say he's cocky, but at least he's got the skills to back up his attitude. With his virtually unreturnable "twist serve," Ryoma is sure to make the starting team.  
  
Join Ryoma and the other first years, as they train hard, make friends, and try to find a place for themselves on the team. Ryoma Echizen is the Prince of Tennis. He may be ready for the Seishun Academy tennis team, but are THEY ready for HIM?

title.en: Uma Musume Pretty Derby - UmaYome Uma X Tore♂ Kekkon Seikatsu Goudou (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: ウマ嫁　ウマ×トレ♂結婚生活合同

description.en: An anthology book series containing many different artists and their favorite Umas enjoying their life after marriage.

Novelist Sakuya decides to live in the countryside at his grandfather's house after his death. On the day of the move, a young man appeared when he was tidying up while immersing himself in memories...?

[Source](https://x.com/daria_fwinc/status/1849028007736058354)

"I've been cheating on you. Oh, and it's not just one guy. It's three. Sorry about that."

Back in middle school, Akiyoshi Sunao's first-ever girlfriend shattered his heart, and he swore off love. However, all that changes when he develops a crush on a girl in his university's film club. Just as he's finally beginning to move on from the past, he bumps into his ex-girlfriend. Little does he know that this is only the beginning...

To his horror, he wakes up in her body the next morning!
description.ja: 「実は4股してるの　ごめんね」。中学時代、人生で初めての彼女にヒドイ振られ方をした秋吉直（あきよしすなお）。「もう誰かを好きになることなんてない」と思っていたが、大学生となり映画サークルの先輩・小河原菜摘（こがはらなつみ）に惹かれ始める。しかし、そんな折に元カノ・西川檸檬（にしかわれもん）と再会。しかも翌朝目が覚めると、身体が入れ替わっていて…!?
description.vi:
"T-tớ đã cắm sừng cậu, không chỉ một anh đâu...là ba anh lận cơ!"
Những câu nói như gai sắt cứa vào tim cậu từ cuối cấp hai năm ấy vẫn còn làm cậu ám ảnh. Akiyoshi Sunao, hiện tại cậu đã trở thành sinh viên năm nhất và làm thành viên của câu lạc bộ phim ảnh, cậu còn nỗi ám ảnh kia là từ mối tình đầu hồi cuối cấp hai của cậu, Lemon Nishikawa. Cậu đã mất niềm tin vào tình yêu suốt cả cao trung, đến khi lên đại học thì anh đã phải lòng crush mới hơn mình một tuổi tên Kogahara Natsumi. Ngay khi cậu nghĩ mình đã suýt thì "move on" và tìm được tình yêu mới để tận hưởng thanh xuân, "Cô bạn" bắt cá bốn tay năm nào lại vô tình xuất hiện. Khoảnh khắc ấy, những câu nói chí mạng như hiện về cứa cậu thêm phát nữa...Cậu đã cố gắng lảng tránh cô người yêu cũ ấy và cổ vũ bản thân vượt lên sự kiện mọc sừng ấy. Cậu suýt thì thành công...
"S-sao mình lại biến thành ghệ cũ của mình?!"
Cậu đã bị hoán đổi linh hồn với chính cô nàng người yêu cũ ấy, và đối phương cũng nhận ra điều đó. Họ phải làm gì để vượt qua nghịch cảnh? Liệu họ có nhìn nhận lại những góc khuất của nhau? Và liệu họ có trở lại với nhau? Mời các bạn đọc truyện nhé!~

Fun fact: Tiêu đề tiếng Nhật của truyện này có thể được dịch thẳng là "Hạnh Phúc Nhé, Con Đĩ!"
description.es-la: "Te he estado engañando. Ah, y no es sólo un chico. Son tres. Lo siento". En la secundaria, la primera novia de Akiyoshi Sunao le destrozó el corazón y renunció al amor. Sin embargo, todo eso cambia cuando se enamora de una chica en el club de cine de su universidad. Justo cuando finalmente comienza a dejar atrás el pasado, se topa con su exnovia. Lo que no sabe es que esto es sólo el comienzo... ¡Para su horror, se despierta en su cuerpo a la mañana siguiente!
description.pt-br: "Eu tenho te traído. Ah, e não é apenas um cara. São três. Desculpe por isso." De volta ao ensino médio, o primeiro amor de Akiyoshi Sunao despedaçou seu coração, e ele jurou evitar o amor. No entanto, tudo muda quando ele se apaixona por uma garota no clube de cinema da universidade. Justo quando ele está começando a superar o passado, ele esbarra com sua ex-namorada. Mal sabe ele que isso é apenas o começo... Para seu horror, ele acorda no corpo dela na manhã seguinte!

description.en: Childhood friend lovestory

altTitles.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
No matter how hard things seem to be, there is always 'someone' watching over you.

A ghost who remained in this world with lingering attachments, one day encountered an office worker left exhausted from work, Nozaki.

"Nobody even looks at me..."

Nozaki was consumed with loneliness.
The ghost, who was all alone at the end of his own life, decided to watch over his daily life.

Though left at the mercy of his job, Nozaki desperately carried on each day.
Until one day, he encountered someone new.

The feelings he lost amid the restless day-to-day, through connecting with others, Nozaki will gradually take back.
description.ja:
どんなつらい時でも、見ていてくれる「誰か」がいる。

この世に未練を残してさまよっていた幽霊は、ある日、仕事に疲れた会社員、野崎と出会う。

「俺のことなんて、誰も見てないんだ…」

孤独感に打ちひしがれる野崎。人生の最後に一人ぼっちだった幽霊は、彼の生活を見守ってみることに。仕事に翻弄されながらも必死に日々を送る野崎。やがて彼に新たな出会いが訪れる。忙しない日々の中でこぼれ落ちてしまった気持ちを、野崎は人との関わりの中で、少しずつ取り戻していく――。

description.en: Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.

Minazo, an eight-year old boy living in Tokyo during the times of scorching heat, is saddened by his parents’ divorce and family separation while he seeks comfort in the popular manga Mokumoku Man. It’s author, Shishio, much like Minazo, is unable to fulfill that certain hole in his heart. Together, where will the chaotic world woven by their thoughts and prayers lead?

altTitles.fr: La fille qui découvre le rock !

description.en: With a passion for richly textured Japanese rock, first-year high school student Chihiro Hatono steps into the world of the light music club, new guitar in tow. But what awaits her behind those doors...? A drama of unfiltered youth and musical ambition takes the stage!
description.es-la: Chihiro Hatono, estudiante de primer año de preparatoria y apasionada por el rock japonés se adentra en el mundo del club de música ligera con una nueva guitarra a cuestas. Pero, ¿qué le espera tras esas puertas...? ¡Un drama sobre juventud sin filtros y ambición musical toma el escenario!
description.pt-br: Com uma paixão pelo rock japonês ricamente texturizado, a estudante do primeiro ano do ensino médio Chihiro Hatono entra no mundo do clube de música leve, com uma nova guitarra em mãos. Mas o que a espera atrás daquelas portas...? Um drama de juventude não filtrada e ambição musical sobe ao palco!

title.en: How to Survive as a Maid in a Horror Game

altTitles.en: Surviving as a Maid in a Horror Game

description.en:
"How did you know? I hid it well so that no one would find out."
 
Adrian Caesar von de Paltzgraf, the successor to the Paltzgraf Family. He is hailed as an angel in this world, but only I knew that the serial murders and murder attempts happening in the area which everyone was talking about were all committed by a young, good-looking gentleman.

[Adrian's murderous intent has increased.]
[Convince Adrian to lower his murderous intent. If not, you die.]
[Adrian's murderous intent is at 92%.]

I am the only one who knows. I was the only one who transmigrated into the world of this ridiculous horror game.

---

Note:
- Only Ridibooks has all the volumes, due to Volume 1 of the side stories being R19.
- "No Exit Horror" is the English name on the ebook and physical Korean novel cover.

title.en: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Douran no Joshou-hen

altTitles.en: The Irregular at Magic High - Upheaval Prologue Arc

altTitles.ja: 魔法科高校の劣等生 動乱の序章編

altTitles.en: The Irregular at Magic High - Prologue of Disturbance Arc

description.en:
March 2097—Brazil deploys the strategic-class spell Synchroliner Fusion in South America, starting a wave of unrest that will reach as far as Japan, where the new school year is just beginning. Tatsuya and Miyuki have entered their third year at First High, but anti-magician sentiment has been steadily rising. As many young scions of the twenty-eight families gather to discuss what to do about the concerning political climate, a much more immediate threat sits just beyond the shores of Sado Island…

Adaption of Light Novel 21-22.
